text: To Be... () is an EP by Taiwanese Mandopop artist Ella Chen () , the member of girl group S.H.E. It was released on 30 March 2012 by HIM International Music and contains five tracks with one bonus song and also three additional demo tracks on the bonus cd. http://www.him.com.tw/album_a.asp?aid=123 ==Track listing== ==Bonus CD== # "NTC (NIKE 2012 Be Amazing運動宣言歌曲)" # "330 (demo)" # " 公主Selina (demo) - (Princess Selina)" ==Music Videos== {| class="wikitable" ! width="280px"|Title !! width="180px"|Director !! width="130px"|Release date !! Link |- | style="text-align:center;"| "Bad Girl" (壞女孩) || style="text- align:center;"| Bill Chia (比爾賈) || March 11, 2012 || MV |- | style="text- align:center;"| "Shameless" (厚臉皮) || style="text-align:center;"| Gui-Chi (鬼才) || April 5, 2012 || MV |- | style="text-align:center;"| "Know me before you love me" (懂我再愛我) || style="text-align:center;"| Shockley Huang (黃中平) || April 26, 2012 || MV |- |} ==References== Category:Ella Chen albums Category:2012 EPs Category:HIM International Music albums
title: To Be Ella
